name: Menzies Consulting
tag_list: pr, public, relations, marketing, business, development
overview:
Menzies Consulting, Inc. is an innovative RTP-based public relations and marketing firm providing strategic messaging solutions to help clients reach their business development and organizational goals.

Our unique, creative, proven methodologies focus on results achieved through public relations; media relations; marketing; branding; website design/enhancement/Search Engine Optimization; online publishing (blogging, podcasting, videocasting); project management; communications consulting (auditing, planning); and advertising (graphic design, production and placement). We offer standard hourly and project-based billing options, as well as long-term monthly retainer contracts.
